Header: President Maithripala Sirisena returns from Malta, Paris visits
Content: President Maithripala Sirisena who visited Malta to attend the Commonwealth Heads of Government Meeting and later traveled to Paris, France to attend the United Nations Conference on Climate Change returned to the country on Tuesday. President Maithripala Sirisena attended the 24th edition of the Commonwealth Heads of Government meeting on November 27 and delivered a special statement to the assembly. The president then traveled to Paris to attend the United Nations Conference on Climate Change which took placeÂ  with the participation of 150 World Leaders. Today, is the second day of the United Nations Conference on Climate Change. Parliamentarian, the Venerable Athuraliye Rathana Thero who also visited Paris on the sidelines of the conference convened a special media briefing there.
